review.title: “Nice place to work”
review.pros: Pros – Great opportunity for growth if you have the skill set and a hard work ethic. My co-workers are so willing to pitch in and help when things get busy.
review.cons: Cons – North 281 traffic can test your nerves
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Continue to hire only individuals who give 110% because a team is only as strong as its weakest link.

review.title: “Employer provides great opportunities to learn and grow in the workplace.”
review.pros: Pros – A great team environment growing at an incredible rate; highest quality product; high level of competency among Attorneys and Staff alike. There are not many small businesses that provide the opportunity to learn and grow these days, but Philip C. Mani & Associates, P.C. does just that.
review.cons: Cons – North 281 traffic can be a bit hectic; but one gets used to it.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Continue to expect only the best performance from each employee in order to maintain the highest quality of your product. Never lower your standard on high quality - both in people and in product.

review.title: “Receptionist to Legal Secretary posting- not happening- no room for growth.”
review.pros: Pros – Good benefits and a very nice office
review.cons: Cons – Young firm, supervising attorney is beyond OCD, co-workers and attorneys make you question your intelligence every day, nontransferable skills
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – stop hiring over-qualified people
